I Am Robbie The

I specialize in front-end development and web design

MY SKILLS

The technologies and process I use

Concepting

Brainstorming user objectives and stories with pen and paper. This part of the process is essential for prioritizing what is most valuable to the user.

Wireframes

Low-fidelity prototypes help shape the user's journey through the website. Pencil sketches and Adobe Xd allow for quick iteration.

Visual Design

High-fidelity mockups incorporate personalized brand style elements using color, typography, and photography with the Adobe suite.

Development

Now it's time to bring the design to life. HTML, CSS, and Javascript, along with related technologies, make the final project functional.
